data.what_is: CAS genesisWorld is your powerful xRM/CRM standard solution for successful and networked relationship management for Customer Centricity businesses. Your CRM. Fascinatingly simple.
data.product_description: CAS genesisWorld is the complete customer relationship management solution. It's so flexible that it can be tailored precisely to your needs and so powerful that you can get started straightaway - CAS genesisWorld can be seamlessly extended as your business expands. A range of smart modules and interfaces means that there is a solution for every requirement. CRM means that you can concentrate on your core businesses, while CAS genesisWorld deals with your processes.
data.supported_languages: Czech, German, English, French, Hungarian, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish, Turkish

initial_reviews.review_title: Best customer maangement and project management tool.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CAS genesisWorld?
Gas genesisworld system management tool to help gathering client detail and to manage all the project with a specific kind of client.
With the Gas genesisworld system you can evaluate a client detail to produce different kind of functionalities and work requirements on a specific kind of project.
All is what to ensure the data of a valuable client and get that manageable through spreading the system to salesdesk and all employee on a sale team.

What do you dislike about CAS genesisWorld?
Gas genesisworld is the best tool I would recommend the team to highlight and marketise the system.

Recommendations to others considering CAS genesisWorld:
I would recommend all of the market to use and gather the info and updated with their client.

What problems is CAS genesisWorld solving and how is that benefiting you?
The system of a client management to help and ensure customer needs and project management with a single functionality.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very flexible and user friendly solution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CAS genesisWorld?
The flexibility given bu Administration Console, the wide range of functionality, especially in Project Management and Helpdesk , modules which are not well covered in most of the other solutions I know

What do you dislike about CAS genesisWorld?
I would like the collaborative portal to be more developed as I see it has high potential

Recommendations to others considering CAS genesisWorld:
If you need a solution fitting a mid-sized organization, which has to be flexible, affordable and easy to use, consider CAS.

What problems is CAS genesisWorld solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer management,  opportunity management, project management with timing and task allocation.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CAS genesisWorld?
Most of all I like the ease with which you can customize it without needing programming skills and I like it because it's a bug-free system.

What do you dislike about CAS genesisWorld?
I don';t like that starting with X9 version, you need Java Script knowledge to customize dynamic fields and formula fields in Smart Design.

What problems is CAS genesisWorld solving and how is that benefiting you?
By implementing genesis to my clients, I have solved many problems with managing architectural and execution projects.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about CAS genesisWorld?
review_question_answers.answer: Most of all I like the ease with which you can customize it without needing programming skills and I like it because it's a bug-free system.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about CAS genesisWorld?
review_question_answers.answer: I don';t like that starting with X9 version, you need Java Script knowledge to customize dynamic fields and formula fields in Smart Design.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is CAS genesisWorld solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: By implementing genesis to my clients, I have solved many problems with managing architectural and execution projects.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CAS genesisWorld?
That I can reassign clients to new sales reps.

What do you dislike about CAS genesisWorld?
Not very user friendly. Lots of steps to figure out.

Recommendations to others considering CAS genesisWorld:
Get lots of training

What problems is CAS genesisWorld solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used CAS for client reassignment. It's nice to be able to bring us the list of clients from sales reps who have left and reassign to new reps.
